title: 呵呵，我是slender！
author: NPC吃草
txt_content:
我最近当了服务器里的slender man得意瞬移的欧！把那些看不起人的土file:///c:/users/administrator/appdata/roaming/360se6/User Data/temp/t01ee20bc09f695dc2e.jpg豪抓森林里玩的团团转！好开心！file:///c:/users/administrator/appdata/roaming/360se6/User Data/temp/t01ee20bc09f695dc2e.jpg大家想在服务器里当个啥捏？
？

replies.author: 末影矿工
replies.txt_content:
我不只要当Slender man
我还要当Jeff the killer, Jane the killer, Ben drowned, Sonic.exe, Suicide Squidward, Suicide Mouse, Herobrine, Happy Apply, Sally, Masky&Hoody......
(Creepypasta)
